nodes.text: The Moth was a truncated speeder bike model produced by the Meirm Speeder Emporium during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The Meirm Moth was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on November 17, 2015 as one of the items in the Force Alliance Pack on the Cartel Market.
